p: There have already been some studies showing that other tissues and organs may also be the target of SARS-CoV-2, further reminding us to focus on other organs besides lungs, such as the kidneys, spleen, and lymph nodes ( 52, 116). This may give us some hints for the multiple organ dysfunction syndrome in some severe COVID-19 cases ( 117). Moreover, research on the expression pattern of ACE2 in different population groups and races indicates that there is no sex or race bias in susceptibility to SARS-CoV-2 ( 118).
